item.description:
Looking forward to seeing everyone for discussions in Italian. Does anyone in the group have to write a letter or other materials in Italian? Bring your draft and we will work on it together.

This will be the first group meeting to run at the same time as John Jordan's Italian classes (which are for registered class members only). We will continue to meet upstairs at Cafe Paradiso. If you are in one of John's sessions, feel free to join the group before or after your class.

group.name: The Boston Italian Language Meetup Group & Luned√¨ Italiano

item.name: The Boston Italian Language February 12 Meetup
